definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.chinese: 唐老鸦的小汽车是红色的。

sentences.english: There three cars made a pari passu advance.
sentences.chinese: 这三辆小汽车以同样的速度前进。

sentences.english: Nina gets into her car and drives toward the exit.
sentences.chinese: 尼娜坐入她的小汽车里，驾车驶向出口。

sentences.english: He bought the car on credit.
sentences.chinese: 他赊帐买了这部小汽车。

sentences.english: There is a car parked right in front of our gate , and we can't getout .
sentences.chinese: 一辆小汽车正好停在我们门口，我们都出不去了。

sentences.english: There is a car near the red house.
sentences.chinese: 那幢红房子旁有一辆小汽车。

sentences.english: I have to load it in the smaller vans and then carry them to the bigger ones parked at the back.
sentences.chinese: 一辆红色的货车往西开，后面还有几辆小汽车和货车。

sentences.english: Draw a car and color it blue.
sentences.chinese: 画一辆小汽车，再把它涂上兰色。

sentences.english: Lucy has just bought a car which lets her drive to her workplace every day.
sentences.chinese: 露丝新买了一辆小汽车，每天以车代步去上班。

sentences.english: But, do I really need a new car?
sentences.chinese: 但是，我真的需要一个小汽车吗？

sentences.english: A car whined in protest, but skidded staunchly out of its driveway.
sentences.chinese: 有辆小汽车呜隆隆响着，好不容易蹒跚驶出马路。

sentences.english: The train collided with a car at the level crossing .
sentences.chinese: 火车在平面交叉道口与一辆小汽车相撞。
唐老鸦的小汽车是什么颜色的？
小汽车穿梭似的来来往往。

definition: small model car/mini-car/small horse-cart/barrow/wheelbarrow/type of folk dance
enclosed carriage for carrying passengers/motor carriage/car or bus/limousine/CL:部[bu4],輛|辆[liang4]
